title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [NEW LAUNCH] What's new in Apache Iceberg v3 and beyond (OPN201)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [新发布] Apache Iceberg v3 及未来版本的新功能 (OPN201)
abstract: Join us to learn about Apache Iceberg Version 3 (V3) and how it addresses critical challenges in modern data lakes. In this session, we'll explore how V3's variant data type, deletion vectors and row lineage capabilities help organizations reduce storage costs, accelerate data operations, and maintain comprehensive audit trails at petabyte scale. We'll also look ahead to what's coming in Apache Iceberg V4. Whether you're managing large-scale data modifications, maintaining regulatory compliance, or optimizing data pipelines, discover how Iceberg V3 transforms data lake performance while reducing operational complexity and costs.
abstract_cn: 加入我们，了解 Apache Iceberg 版本 3 (V3) 以及它如何应对现代数据湖中的关键挑战。在本次会议中，我们将探讨 V3 的变体数据类型、删除向量和行级血缘功能如何帮助组织降低存储成本、加速数据操作，并在 PB 级规模下维护全面的审计跟踪。我们还将展望 Apache Iceberg V4 的未来发展。无论您是在管理大规模数据修改、维护合规性，还是优化数据管道，都可以了解 Iceberg V3 如何在降低运营复杂性和成本的同时转变数据湖性能。
